activities: We provide a SaaS based software solution that allows our clients to store, retrieve and view electronic version of their business documents.  It is possible for a client to include documents that contain personal information in the documents they scan into our solution.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms:
TRUSTe Web Privacy Seal Program
TRUSTe EU Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) for HR data, TRUSTe Watchdog Resolution Program for all other data
